subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Trey Burke hit a tying 3-pointer with three seconds left in regulation to give Michigan early momentum in overtime. The Wolverines shut down Ben McLemore to edge Kansas.
snippet: Trey Burke hit a tying 3-pointer with three seconds left in regulation to give Michigan early momentum in overtime. The Wolverines shut down Ben McLemore to edge Kansas.
